CustomField.description: Req#2653: Data Quality past due issue for predictive analysis.
CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c , "Risk"), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "Upside"), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "Secure"), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "ROP"), ISPICKVAL( Forecast_Category__c, "Excluded") ) && ( Past_Due__c = True || ( Today() >= POPlanReceipt__r.Start_Date__c && Today() <= POPlanReceipt__r.End_Date__c )= True)
CustomField.label: Data Quality Past Due PREDICTIVE
